lines: A terrified Aaron and Aldous head down the gangplank.  They are greeted by the Flight Attendant.
Hello, again, Mr. Greenberg.  Did you enjoy your stay in London?
Hi there, love.  Well aren’t you looking beautiful today?  I should fly all the time.
May I lead you to your seats?
Aldous HITS his call buzzer.  A FLIGHT ATTENDANT heads over.
How do you know?  You haven’t tried them yet.
